definition: in order to avoid/so as not to
old variant of 以[yi3]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
old variant of 以[yi3]
to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
old variant of 絻[wen4]
to remove sth that could be used as a pretext (idiom)

sentences.english: To avoid duplication, please do not mail faxed order form.
sentences.chinese: 已传真表格，毋须再邮寄，以免重复。

sentences.english: She avoids big-ticket clothing items in case they may be counterfeit — as well as anything edible.
sentences.chinese: 她不买高价服装以免碰到假货，还有吃的东西。

sentences.english: Fortunately, Ijurmped back in time to avoid being hit.
sentences.chinese: 很侥幸，我及时往后跳以免费遭撞击。

sentences.english: Send us a check today, do it now, so you will not forget.
sentences.chinese: 请于今日立即寄出支票，以免忘怀为幸。

sentences.english: And the nutrition will also be lost if we use the iron or copper pan to cook the mushrooms.
sentences.chinese: 煮蘑菇时也不能用铁锅或铜锅，以免造成营养损失。

sentences.english: I believe the thinking of people can progress, so as to avoid hoodwinked, you do » And ideals.
sentences.chinese: 我相信思考分析可以让人进步，以免上当受骗，您呢？

sentences.english: She defended herself from the attack.
sentences.chinese: 她保护自己以免遭受袭击。

sentences.english: Mind your bicycles so as not to be stolen by the thieves hereabout .
sentences.chinese: 请你照看好你的自行车，附近小偷很多，以免被偷。

sentences.english: Take extra care not to damage the wiring harnesses.
sentences.chinese: 请格外小心以免损坏线束。

sentences.english: Food with a lot of fat should be watched carefully - cooking to for too long can lead to burning.
sentences.chinese: 不宜长时间烹煮油脂重的食物，以免油脂过热发烟。

sentences.english: We must be careful, however, to avoid misconception.
sentences.chinese: 然而我们必须仔细，以免造成错误想法。

sentences.english: Before climbing it is BEST to be properly prepared, in case of any mishap.
sentences.chinese: 爬山之前最好有万全的准备，以免发生山难。

sentences.english: Arrange the chair, desk, and computer screen to avoid neck, wrist, and head pain.
sentences.chinese: 摆放好桌椅和电脑屏幕以免你的脖子，手腕和头疼痛。

sentences.english: Send us a check today. Do it now, so you won't forget.
sentences.chinese: 请于今日立即寄出支票以免忘怀为幸。

sentences.english: Wash with cold water. This will prevent shrinking.
sentences.chinese: 用凉水清洗，以免羽绒服缩水。

sentences.english: The United Nations vaccinates children who would otherwise die from preventable diseases.
sentences.chinese: 联合国为儿童进行接种，以免他们死于可预防的疾病。

definition: (so as) to avoid/to prevent/(just) in case
to avert/to prevent/to avoid/to refrain from
remember at all costs
to avoid as taboo/to avoid by all means
by no means
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
as much as possible/to the greatest extent
don't!/must not
to prevent/to guard against/to take precautions
not suitable/inadvisable/inappropriate
best/(you) had better (do what we suggest)
to take note of/to pay attention to
you must not/Please don't.../be sure not to/on no account (do it)
must/to need to/to be sure to
if not/otherwise/else/or else
to guard against/to beware of
to be careful/to take care
